docs.text: SBatch #SBATCH - Bash "sees" this as comment. #SBATCH - Bash "sees" this as comment. #SBATCH - Slurm "takes" them as parameter. Use ## to close #SBATCH as comment. Example of SBatch Script Flags Description Parameter Description Default --some-option This is a command parameter default value Submit Job $ sbatch ./submit.sh $ sbatch --qos=name ./submit.sh Cancel Job $ cancel <job-id>
